title: Settings Window - typography controls
description: Create native Settings window with font selection (body and heading fonts), font size controls with lock proportions toggle, heading weight/italic/spacing controls. Roadmap item 14. This is a large effort.

title: Print Support
description: Implement File > Print with print-friendly styles, hide UI chrome, handle page breaks properly. Roadmap item 13.

title: Settings: Spacing and Page Breaks
description: Add line height, paragraph spacing, list spacing controls; implement page break estimator with auto-adjust and visual indicators. Roadmap item 15.

title: Multiple Windows support
description: Support multiple open windows (one file per window), implement File > New Window, File > Close, remember window size/position per file. Roadmap item 11.

title: Live Reload - auto re-render on file change
description: Monitor open file for changes with 1-second polling, auto re-render on modification, preserve scroll position during reload. This is item 9 in the roadmap - the first post-MVP feature.
close_reason: Implemented live reload with 1-second polling, scroll position preservation, and Cmd+R refresh menu item. All 70 tests pass.

title: Settings Persistence and Live Update
description: Persist all settings in UserDefaults, apply changes immediately to open documents via JavaScript bridge, implement Reset to Defaults. Roadmap item 16.

title: Complete Menu Structure
description: Implement complete menu bar (File, Edit, View, Window, Help) with all keyboard shortcuts as specified in PRD. Roadmap item 12.
